text: "Sanamahi Kachin", also known as "Lainingthou Kachin", is an altar place dedicated to Lainingthou Sanamahi in the household of the followers of Meitei religion (Sanamahism). It is located at the south-western corner of the house. According to religious beliefs, people performing rites and rituals, as well as prayers to the deity, in the place, get blessings from the deity. ==Related pages== * Imoinu ==References== Category:Religion in India
title: Sanamahi Kachin
